pr_title: Wire-up geotile_grid and geohash_grid to ValuesSourceRegistry

timeline.message:
Wire-up geotile_grid and geohash_grid to ValuesSourceRegistry

This commit updates the geo*_grid aggregations to depend
on registering itself in the ValuesSourceRegistry

relates to the values-source refactoring meta issue #42949.
update supplier to use generic ValuesSource

timeline.bodyText: I didn't know you could type cast a lambda, that's a really elegant solution.   I kind of want to go back and change some of the others to use this pattern.
timeline.author: not-napoleon

replies.bodyText: I didn't either, but Intellij recommended it and then auto-wrote it for me!
replies.author: talevy

timeline.bodyText: I think we need to move creating the CellIdSource into the supplier.  This line is casting to a GeoPoint, but we don't know that we always have a GeoPoint here, because we can't know at compile time what Values Sources have been registered for this aggregation.  My guideline has been that we should only care about ValuesSource subclasses at the supplier layer or the aggregator itself, not the factory or the builder.
timeline.author: not-napoleon

timeline.bodyText: My preference is to PR these tests separately against master first, so we can validate that the type support hasn't changed in the registry branch.
timeline.author: not-napoleon

replies.bodyText: will do this in a separate PR
replies.author: talevy
